00045 // Flags used in command handling.
00046 
00047 // These flags represent the majority of the states that affect
00048 // whether or not items in menus are enabled or disabled.
00049 enum {
00050    AudioIONotBusyFlag     = 0x00000001,
00051    TimeSelectedFlag       = 0x00000002,
00052    TracksSelectedFlag     = 0x00000004,
00053    TracksExistFlag        = 0x00000008,
00054    LabelTracksExistFlag   = 0x00000010,
00055    WaveTracksSelectedFlag = 0x00000020,
00056    ClipboardFlag          = 0x00000040,
00057    TextClipFlag           = 0x00000040, // Same as Clipboard flag for now.
00058    UnsavedChangesFlag     = 0x00000080,
00059    HasLastEffectFlag      = 0x00000100,
00060    UndoAvailableFlag      = 0x00000200,
00061    RedoAvailableFlag      = 0x00000400,
00062    ZoomInAvailableFlag    = 0x00000800,
00063    ZoomOutAvailableFlag   = 0x00001000,
00064    StereoRequiredFlag     = 0x00002000,  //lda
00065    TopDockHasFocus        = 0x00004000,  //lll
00066    TrackPanelHasFocus     = 0x00008000,  //lll
00067    BotDockHasFocus        = 0x00010000,  //lll
00068    LabelsSelectedFlag     = 0x00020000,
00069    AudioIOBusyFlag        = 0x00040000,  //lll
00070    PlayRegionLockedFlag   = 0x00080000,  //msmeyer
00071    PlayRegionNotLockedFlag= 0x00100000,  //msmeyer
00072    CutCopyAvailableFlag   = 0x00200000,
00073    WaveTracksExistFlag    = 0x00400000,
00074    NoteTracksExistFlag    = 0x00800000,  //gsw
00075    NoteTracksSelectedFlag = 0x01000000   //gsw
00076 };

00126    // A list of directories that should be searched
00127    // for Audacity files (plug-ins, help files, etc.).  On Unix
00128    // this will include the directory Audacity was installed into,
00129    // plus the current user's .audacity-files directory.  Additional
00130    // directories can be specified using the AUDACITY_PATH environment
00131    // variable.  On Windows or Mac OS, this will include the directory
00132    // which contains the Audacity program.  
00133    wxArrayString audacityPathList;
